text: Michael Shawn Hettinga (born on July 17, 1978) is an American professional wrestler that is currently working for Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). He is best known for working with WWE on all three brands (Raw, SmackDown and ECW) from 2006 to 2010. He was released from his WWE contract on April 23, 2010. He had a dark match in Total Nonstop Action Wrestling in May, 2012. ==References== Category:American professional wrestlers Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from California Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:San Bernardino, California
title: Mike Knox
